subject: issue with tons of flex in pedal plate
description_text:
amazon order id:
113-7988704-4705004


i was told to contact you guys in regards to the pedal plate flex im
dealing with. i have this plate mounted to the aluminum profiles and the
plate flexes so much when braking that the gas pedal moves. i’ve tried
bolting everything as close to the brake pedal as possible to reduce flex
but nothing works. i got it with the plate because i thought it would help
with this issue but it seems like it’s worse.
